title: Ranking System (C, B, A, S)
body:
Not really sure how the ranking system works as I came out of a ranked game as a 7/0/9 Vi, where my:
8/2/6 Ezreal, 
9/0/1 Vayne
11/3/6 Ekko 
all got S ranks and all I got was an A+. 
As a jungler, I was also working to get my laners fed, leaving the kills for them, only netting me an assist. Is this also considered in ranks?

I had less deaths than everyone except Vayne (0) 
The best KDA (16 Kill participations, 0 deaths - Ekko's 17 kill participations, 3 deaths)
Came out disappointed from the result, any explanations?
